header.description: Header information stored with the event.

name.description: The name of the event, e.g. the type of event. For example, 'notificationRequestEvent', 'entityChangeEvent'

PlatformEventHeader.description: A header included with each DataHub platform event.

timestampMillis.description: The event timestamp field as epoch at UTC in milli seconds.

GenericPayload.description: Generic payload record structure for serializing a Platform Event.

value.description: The value of the event, serialized as bytes.

contentType.description:
The content type, which represents the fashion in which the event was serialized.
The only type currently supported is application/json.
